data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in ‘Eua, Tonga to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of ‘Eua, Tonga
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 784 believers in 'Eua to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in ‘Eua, Tonga.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of 'Eua.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of ‘Eua, Tonga.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of ‘Ohonua, ‘Eua, Tonga.
Father, remind your church in 'Eua that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 4,009 people in the state of 'Eua who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.section_summary:
the state of ‘Eua, Tonga has a population of 5,000.

We estimate 'Eua has 784 people who might know Jesus, 4,009 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 207 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of 'Eua, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
